pullrequest.title: add ci jobs for ignition release branches on brew and windows

content.raw:
I think the only new jobs for Windows generated by this PR will be math4, the others already exist:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-ign-math2-windows7-amd64/ - builds
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-ign-math3-windows7-amd64/ - builds
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-ci-ign-msgs1-windows7-amd64/ - job exists, should we add msgs1 to ignition_branches?
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-windows7-amd64/ - should build? I thought ign-transport was Windows-compatible from day 1, but I guess setting up Jenkins without ign-cmake could be a lot of work.
content.html:
I think the only new jobs for Windows generated by this PR will be math4, the others already exist:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-ign-math2-windows7-amd64/ - builds
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-ign-math3-windows7-amd64/ - builds
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-ci-ign-msgs1-windows7-amd64/ - job exists, should we add msgs1 to ignition_branches?
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-windows7-amd64/ - should build? I thought ign-transport was Windows-compatible from day 1, but I guess setting up Jenkins without ign-cmake could be a lot of work.
